Keep a diary at 1976f.com, share life moments with your closest friends, optionally

Features:

- Record your true feelings through simple and elegant user interface, no bloats, no ads
- Secretly make some notes visible to your friends, wait for them to discover with our carefully designed discovery system
- Your data is encrypted end-to-end, even server owner cannot access your content
- Access your notes from pc, mobile and now one click away from browser button
- Drafts are automatically saved and synchronized
- Protect your screen by setting a PIN code
- Export your notes to JSON, any time
- Import your notes from various sources (coming soon)



Visit for more: 
https://1976f.com
